content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. All attempts to create and supply a Lab (intended for Automation Science Pack research) at (0.5, 2.5) have failed, and no alternative building complexes have been added.

ERROR TIPS
• get_entities Misuse – Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (e.g., “radius”) or extra positional parameters when calling get_entities. Always confirm the function’s signature before use.
• Lab Crafting and Placement Issues – Repeated lab crafting failures stem from missing sub-ingredients (such as iron‐gear‐wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) and insufficient intermediate products (iron-plate, copper-plate). Also, lab placement attempts fail when no lab is present in inventory. Ensure that all prerequisites are met and the lab is available before placement.
• Iteration on NoneType – Filtering operations on a None value (for example, when existing lab entities are expected) cause TypeErrors. Apply fallback measures (e.g., substituting with an empty list) to prevent iterating over None.
